text: Kenneth Francis Hackett (born January 27, 1947) is an American politician and Catholic official. He was the United States Ambassador to the Holy See from August 2013 until January 2017. He was president of Catholic Relief Services (CRS). ==References== Category:Living people Category:1947 births Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the Holy See Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Politicians from Boston
title: Ken Hackett
